title: Hey guys i haven't got my lvl 3 RP that everyone is talking about please help.
body:
So yeah I haven't got my RP for LVL 3 yet and I'm really annoyed because i want to get out of these lower LVLs faster help would be nice D:
Regards 
ME :D

replies.body:
Hey there,

The RP reward was removed when hextech crafting was introduced, now you should receive a "Starter chest" at level 3(? or 5, i'm not sure).

:O that is sillyyyy ty for the coment. WOW that is annoying. I wanted that xp boost wow
thanks dude
